## hpr1478 :: Batteries Part 2

 
A show about batteries - Part 2


My Slow Battery Charger
Hahnel Powerstation TC Max, provides gentle overnight trickle charging 


https://www.amazon.co.uk/Hahnel-Powerstation-TC-Compact-Batteries/dp/B00007B5CE



Powerbase battery electric drill, had difficult finding a good link to an example of the drill. 
It came with a selection of drill bits, sockets and two double ended screwdriver bits.


https://www.bumblebeeauctions.co.uk/XcAPViewItem.asp?ID=137697



Cannon A80 digital Camera


https://www.canon.co.uk/For_Home/Product_Finder/Cameras/Digital_Camera/PowerShot/PowerShot_A80/



A picture of my trusty Philips 5890 Shaver

https://www.amazon.co.uk/Garmin-Streetpilot-i3-Navigation-Mapping/dp/B000BMPJOE



Sansa Clip+
